# bastion_account_command (Resource)

Manages a Bastion account command grant

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "bastion_account_command" "example" {
  account = "cal-el"
  command = "selfAddPersonalAccess"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `account` (String) The name of the Bastion account
- `command` (String) The command to grant to the account

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The resource identifier (account:command)

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
# Account command grants can be imported using the format: account:command
terraform import bastion_account_command.example cal-el:selfAddPersonalAccess
```
